City Financial

May 2015

The brief

Visual design for City Financial, an investment management firm based in London.

The work

This was part of a prospective redesign project for City Financial, completed while I was at Siteset Digital. My task was to increase the visual impact of the home page, whilst retaining the existing content structure. Sadly the project never went ahead.

Can I help with your design or development work? Get in touch.
